page.title: 07A 7-YR-OLD'S DAY IN DAGENHAM
page.content: In the morning my brother David wakes me up and say's,"Can I play with your hoola hoop game, Laura?" So I say,"Yes, but we'll take it into your bedroom." A hoola hoop game is where you have five hoops and you throw them at five hooks. We both have four goes then mummy comes and we go downstairs. For my breakfast have cocoa pops. They are a crispy cereal with chocolate on and you put milk on them. My mum reads the newspaper, while I get washed. Ialso clean my teeth wiyh toothpaste. I get dressed and my mum walks me to school. When I get to school the teacher calls the register. She calls all our names and when we answer she marks us in.
